hanzi-su-wiki:
蘇

Значения

Воскресать, оживать

Мнемоника

Пробуждаться от спячки, как рыба 魚 карп, а также злаки 禾 и травы 艹 весной.

Варианты

苏, 甦, 蘓
purpleculture_pinyin:
sū
Perilla frutescens (Chinese basil or wild red basil); place name; to revive; used as phonetic in transliteration
Perilla frutescens (китайский базилик или дикий красный базилик); Укажите имя; возродить; используется как фонетический при транслитерации

(Simplified: 苏)
Ideographic: A perennial 穌 grass 艹; 穌 also provides the pronunciation

蘇維埃 [ sū wéi āi ]: Soviet (council)

heisig_chinese_memo: Fish wild rice, my favorite dish, has been revived as a popular dish.  The flowers represent my revive-al celebration.
Ru_Radicals: 艾 (мокса), 杰, 田 (рисовое поле), 禾 (ость колоса), 魚 (рыба)
Ru_trainchinese:
sū: (графема) оживать, приходить в себя; (бот.) перилла; (декоративная) кисточка
sū: (сущ) (сокр.) провинция Цзянсу; (сокр.) Советский Союз, СССР
sū: (сущ) (сокр.) город Сучжоу
Kanshudo_mnemonic: grass (艹), grain (禾), or fish (魚) would revive you
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: If you start sweating and fall unconscious these flowers can revive you.
humanum_full_description_en:
Elaboration: According to the original meaning of " Suo Wen", the original meaning of " Su " is Gui Lu (Xu Shen), which is now Perilla. "Said Wen": "Su, Guimeng also. Conghe, Susheng." "Er Ya. "Shi Lu": "Su, Gui Fu also." Li Shizhen, "Compendium of Materia Medica. Grass three. "Su": "Those who say perilla are different from Baisu. Su is a kind of elixir, and the taste is more pungent like gui. Therefore, "Erya" is called gui nian." " Su " is often used as the country name and last name in ancient books.

The inscription " Su " is used as the name of the country, and it is wide and tripod: "Su Gong's grandson Huaer chooses his auspicious gold." The place is in the southwest of Wenxian County, Henan Province. "Shang Shu. The Policy ":" Secretary Kousu Gong "Brief Account Justice:" Sue is the name of the country, the land of their town names are warm. "Inscriptions or writing" Jesus "see" Jesus . "

The ancients used the name of the town as the surname, and the " Su " in Qin Xi was used as the name of the person. For example, page 9 of "The Compilation of Qin Yin Scripts": "Su You." The 16th line of the Book of Political Strategists in the Warring States Period: "King Yan, please do not appoint Su Qin to do things", referring to King Yan's request not to appoint Su Qin to any ministry.
humanum_short_description_en: " Su " from the sound of "艸", " Sus ", the original meaning is Guiren, which is now Perilla. In ancient books, it is often used as country name and surname.
humanum_full_description:
「蘇」字據《說文》本義為桂荏(許慎)，即現在的紫蘇。《說文》：「蘇，桂荏也。从艸，穌聲。」《爾雅．釋艸》：「蘇，桂荏也。」李時珍《本草綱目．草三．蘇》：「曰紫蘇者，以別白蘇也。蘇乃荏類，而味更辛如桂，故《爾雅》謂之桂荏。」「蘇」字古書中又多用作國名與姓氏。

　　金文「蘇」用作國名，寬兒鼎：「蘇公之孫寛兒擇其吉金。」地在今河南省溫縣西南。《尚書．立政》：「司寇蘇公。」孔穎達正義：「蘇是國名，所都之地其邑名溫。」金文或寫作「穌」，參見「穌」。

　　古人或以邑名用作姓氏，秦璽中「蘇」用作人名，如《秦印文字彙編》頁9：「蘇游。」馬王堆帛書亦用作姓氏，《馬王堆帛書．戰國縱橫家書》第16行：「燕王請毋任蘇秦以事」，指燕王請求不要委任蘇秦任何職事。
humanum_short_description: 「蘇」從「艸」，「穌」聲，本義為桂荏，即現在的紫蘇。古書中又多用作國名與姓氏。

English Definition: Perilla frutescens (Chinese basil or wild red basil); place name; to revive; used as phonetic in transliteration
Total strokes: 19; Radical: 艸
Ideographic: A perennial 穌 grass 艹; 穌 also provides the pronunciation
Character Formation:

    • 艹 [ cǎo ] grass, weed, plant, herb
    • 穌 [ sū ] to revive; to rise again

蘇維埃 [ sū wéi āi ]: Soviet (council)

蘇蘇RS
苏苏 		蘓 purple perilla, revive
  • lively 穌 plant 艹
  • plant 艹 you can use 办
(Simplified: 苏)
Chinese Definition:
Ideographic: A perennial 穌 grass 艹; 穌 also provides the pronunciation
  • ⿱ Above to below
    • 艹 [ cǎo ] grass, weed, plant, herb
    • 穌 [ sū ] to revive; to rise again
①喚醒；昏迷後醒過來。［合］蘇省(甦醒)；蘇活(甦醒；復活)；蘇興(猶甦醒)。
②割草；取草。［例］行者踐其首脊，蘇者取而爨之而已。——《莊子·天運》。
③引申爲取。［例］蘇糞壤以充幃兮。——《離騷》。
④困頓後獲得休息。［合］蘇息；蘇坐(散坐；隨便坐)。
⑤拯救；解救。［合］蘇困(解除困苦)；蘇枯(使枯萎的草木復活。比喻使困頓、災難中的人得到拯救)；蘇世(猶醒世)。
蘇聯 [ sū lián ]: Soviet Union, 1922-1991; abbr. for Union of Soviet Socialist Republics (USSR) 苏维埃社会主义共和国联盟
蘇維埃 [ sū wéi āi ]: Soviet (council)

「 蘇 」字據《說文》本義為桂荏(許慎)，即現在的紫蘇。《說文》：「蘇，桂荏也。从艸，穌聲。」《爾雅．釋艸》：「蘇，桂荏也。」李時珍《本草綱目．草三．蘇》：「曰紫蘇者，以別白蘇也。蘇乃荏類，而味更辛如桂，故《爾雅》謂之桂荏。」「 蘇 」字古書中又多用作國名與姓氏。 金文「 蘇 」用作國名，寬兒鼎：「蘇公之孫寛兒擇其吉金。」地在今河南省溫縣西南。《尚書．立政》：「司寇蘇公。」孔穎達正義：「蘇是國名，所都之地其邑名溫。」金文或寫作「 穌 」，參見「 穌 」。 古人或以邑名用作姓氏，秦璽中「 蘇 」用作人名，如《秦印文字彙編》頁9：「蘇游。」馬王堆帛書亦用作姓氏，《馬王堆帛書．戰國縱橫家書》第16行：「燕王請毋任蘇秦以事」，指燕王請求不要委任蘇秦任何職事。
Elaboration: According to the original meaning of " Suo Wen", the original meaning of " Su" is Gui Lu (Xu Shen), which is now Perilla. "Said Wen": "Su, Guimeng also. Conghe, Susheng." "Er Ya. "Shi Lu": "Su, Gui Fu also." Li Shizhen, "Compendium of Materia Medica. Grass three. "Su": "Those who say perilla are different from Baisu. Su is a kind of elixir, and the taste is more pungent like gui. Therefore, "Erya" is called gui nian." " Su" is often used as the country name and last name in ancient books. The inscription " Su" is used as the name of the country, and it is wide and tripod: "Su Gong's grandson Huaer chooses his auspicious gold." The place is in the southwest of Wenxian County, Henan Province. "Shang Shu. The Policy ":" Secretary Kousu Gong "Brief Account Justice:" Sue is the name of the country, the land of their town names are warm. "Inscriptions or writing" Jesus"see" Jesus. " The ancients used the name of the town as the surname, and the " Su" in Qin Xi was used as the name of the person. For example, page 9 of "The Compilation of Qin Yin Scripts": "Su You." The 16th line of the Book of Political Strategists in the Warring States Period: "King Yan, please do not appoint Su Qin to do things", referring to King Yan's request not to appoint Su Qin to any ministry.
